data.title: 101110165-AVDLMEM
data.meta_description: Secretary of Veterans Affairs Eric Shinseki spoke at the November 10 groundbreaking of the American Veterans Disabled for Life Memorial in Washington, DC, along with actor Gary Senise, former VA Deputy Secretary Gordon Mansfield and Scott Brown, son of former Secretary of Veterans Affairs Jesse Brown who helped create the memorial. Located at the foot of Capitol Hill, the memorial celebrates those men and women who may be broken in body—but never in spirit. For more, go to www.avdlm.org/site/c.gnKFIJNqEqG/b.5287617/k.BEA8/Home.htm
data.text: Secretary of Veterans Affairs Eric Shinseki spoke at the November 10 groundbreaking of the American Veterans Disabled for Life Memorial in Washington, DC, along with actor Gary Senise, former VA Deputy Secretary Gordon Mansfield and Scott Brown, son of former Secretary of Veterans Affairs Jesse Brown who helped create the memorial. Located at the foot of Capitol Hill, the memorial celebrates those men and women who may be broken in body—but never in spirit. For more, go to www.avdlm.org/site/c.gnKFIJNqEqG/b.5287617/k.BEA8/Home.htm
